item.title: Computation Guides
item.description: Guide to Euler-Cromer Method Guide to Scipy's Odeint Guide to plotting with Matplotlib Guide to plotting with Bokeh Guide to Sympy Guide to Animation in Matplotlib

item.title: Graduate School Notes
item.description: Quantum Mechanics The complete set of my graduate Quantum Mechanic’s notes, both semesters included. Hopefully by posting them here they can be of use to someone besides myself! Quantum Notes Advanced Dynamics These unfortunately are incomplete at the moment. Should I find the time to begin updating them again, I will post to make folk aware. Advanced Dynamics Notes Statistical Mechanics The finished set of my graduate Statistical Mechanic’s notes.
